TextView.android:text: This project is for a mobile application which is about Find Parking at everywhere that a person goes to such as malls and hospitals and so on .This application will enable registered people on that app to find and reserve the park easily and saves people time . The goal of this project is to save time and ease of obtaining a park, as some people have important appointments and there may be some crowding in the place they want to go to, so the parking is reserved to ensure that his time is not wasted.
